message.body: Just so ya know, opas picking you up.
Omg I almost missed the bus. Dude totally saw me and like almost drove away but then stopped in the middle of the intersection. Like he had a change of heart. Jesus I would've been pissed
Hahahahaha. He probably thought you were so beautiful and was like "what am I doing? She needs to be on my bus!"
Ahaha it'd be nice but he just looked annoyed lol I paid and was like "thanks for not ignoring me" haha
I'm seriously also debating just not going to work tomorrow. I haven't missed a day in the six months I've been there! I really want to. Haha. Plus, I didn't finish my lab assignment.
So I just stood outside for about 20 minutes and had to detour for the stupid bus. I'm going to miss my train!!
Just gonna have mommy drop me off.
The heck. I emailed my ta right after you left and I still haven't gotten an answer. You think one of them would check their emails.
